channel.title: Deleteing a specific item out of bank?
channel.description: well title kinda says it all im using a 317 pi, how would i go about making a dialogue action that goes into players bankitems and deletes a specific item number? just wondering thanks!

item.title: Deleteing a specific item out of bank?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:5, topic:516986”][quote author=1 2 3 4 KOED link=topic=635248.msg4285588#msg4285588 date=1366297409]
Or you could just delete the item from item.cfg and make it pointless.
[/quote]
He dont want to delete this item for ever lol he just want to delete the item from the player bank… (from what i understood)[/quote]

yes exactly what i want to do, ima have it where when a player talks to a certain npc and make a dialogue action that does it. i dont know where to start sorta anyone know?

Read full topic

item.title: Deleteing a specific item out of bank?
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Like in item id? if so you can make a for loop to loop on your bank and then use an “if” to check if the itemId Is the id you want to delete and if so delete it.
